title: The Afghanistan Cover Up Begins (Ep 1591)
description:
This is BS! Get ready for the cover-up in Afghanistan to begin. I also address the explosive new data from Israel about the coronavirus surge.

News Picks:

The Taliban are already acting like the savages they are.


The hapless Biden administration is preparing to blame the Americans they’re preparing to leave behind. 

Just 1% of people with a prior covid infection get re-infected.

Were transplant patients removed from a waiting list for refusing to take the vaccine?


Martina Navratilova sends a sick tweet out, mocking a death from covid. 


The House advances the 3.5T dollar bankruptcy bill.
